creator: jeroen@vangelderen.org
text:
The ServletLogAppender class allows Log4J events to be logged to the Servlet 
container's log(String) and log(String, Throwable) methods. An example use can 
be found in http://jeroen.vangelderen.org/patches/velocity/ServletSkeleton.txt .

creator: ceki@apache.org
